name: The Blocky Diemen Inc. Team Bonding Dodgeball Bonanza
name_original: The Blocky Diemen Inc. Team Bonding Dodgeball Bonanza
description:
It's that time again, the annual notorious team bonding event. This time the Blocky Diemen Inc. have chosen dodgeball as their activity.

It's a game of dice going against other teams of dice in dodgeball. It's pretty simple, when you get the ball, you can move and then either pass the ball or throw it to the enemy. If the thrower's dice value is bigger than the target, they will get knocked out. Otherwise they catch it and it's their turn to go for offence.

Can be played with mouse only but also has some hotkeys for quality of life reasons. Also has a hot seat multiplier mode.

Dev Timelapse
